column.name: NM
column.value: Upload Customer CSV Files

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows access to the Customer Upload Batch Upload page.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.sql: insert into KRIM_TYP_ATTR_T (kim_typ_attr_id, obj_id, ver_nbr, sort_cd, kim_typ_id, kim_attr_defn_id, actv_ind) values ('KFSSEC1010', 'KFSSEC1010', 1, 'd', (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_TYP_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-COA' and nm = 'Sub-Account & Document Type'), (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-COA' and nm = 'organizationCode'), 'Y');

column.value: Upload Labor Enterprise Feed Batch Files

changeSet.author: jksmith
changeSet.comment: Creates a permission to allow KFS-SYS Operations and KFS-FP Disbursement Manager to set a DV for immediate disbursement.

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select perm_tmpl_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'Use Transactional Document')

column.name: NM
column.value: Allow DV Immediate Disbursement

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allow Disbursement Voucher to be marked for immediate disbursement by the Pre-Disbursement Processor.

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'Use Transactional Document')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'Use Transactional Document')

column.name: ROLE_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select role_id from KRIM_ROLE_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-FP' and role_nm = 'Disbursement Manager')

column.name: ROLE_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select role_id from KRIM_ROLE_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-SYS' and role_nm = 'Operations')

changeSet.author: jksmith
changeSet.comment: New KIM role type, role, and responsibility action for KFS-VND Exclude Single Actor Reviewer. This one is ugly, sorry about that...

column.name: NM
column.value: Exclude Single Actor Separation Of Duties

column.name: ROLE_NM
column.value: Exclude Single Actor Reviewer

column.name: MBR_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select role_id from KRIM_ROLE_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-VND' and role_nm = 'Reviewer')

delete.where: role_rsp_id in (select role_rsp_id from KRIM_ROLE_RSP_T where role_id = (select role_id from KRIM_ROLE_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-VND' and role_nm = 'Reviewer') and rsp_id = (select KRIM_RSP_T.rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_T join ((select rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_ATTR_DATA_T where kim_attr_defn_id = (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'documentTypeName') and attr_val = 'PVEN') r_a_d1 join (select rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_ATTR_DATA_T where kim_attr_defn_id = (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'routeNodeName') and attr_val = 'Management') r_a_d2 on r_a_d1.rsp_id = r_a_d2.rsp_id) on KRIM_RSP_T.rsp_id = r_a_d1.rsp_id where KRIM_RSP_T.nmspc_cd = 'KFS-VND'))

role_id = (select role_id from KRIM_ROLE_T where nmspc_cd = 'KFS-VND' and role_nm = 'Reviewer') and rsp_id = (select KRIM_RSP_T.rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_T join ((select rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_ATTR_DATA_T where kim_attr_defn_id = (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'documentTypeName') and attr_val = 'PVEN') r_a_d1 join (select rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_ATTR_DATA_T where kim_attr_defn_id = (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'routeNodeName') and attr_val = 'Management') r_a_d2 on r_a_d1.rsp_id = r_a_d2.rsp_id) on KRIM_RSP_T.rsp_id = r_a_d1.rsp_id where KRIM_RSP_T.nmspc_cd = 'KFS-VND')

column.name: RSP_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select KRIM_RSP_T.rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_T join ((select rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_ATTR_DATA_T where kim_attr_defn_id = (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'documentTypeName') and attr_val = 'PVEN') r_a_d1 join (select rsp_id from KRIM_RSP_ATTR_DATA_T where kim_attr_defn_id = (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'routeNodeName') and attr_val = 'Management') r_a_d2 on r_a_d1.rsp_id = r_a_d2.rsp_id) on KRIM_RSP_T.rsp_id = r_a_d1.rsp_id where KRIM_RSP_T.nmspc_cd = 'KFS-VND')

changeSet.author: jksmith
changeSet.comment: New role for administration of Payee ACH Accounts, with attendant new KIM role type and permissions. SQL contributed by Ying.

column.name: NM
column.value: Payee ACH Account

column.name: ROLE_NM
column.value: Payee ACH Accounts Administrator

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Administration staff who can view and update Payee ACH Account records and the legacy history of a certain ACH Transaction Type.

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select perm_tmpl_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Create / Maintain Record(s)' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS')

column.name: NM
column.value: Maintain ACH Accounts

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows to view and update Payee ACH Accounts of a certain transaction type.

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Create / Maintain Record(s)' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS')

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'documentTypeName')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Create / Maintain Record(s)' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS')

column.valueNumeric: (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'existingRecordsOnly')

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select perm_tmpl_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Look Up Records' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS')

column.name: NM
column.value: Lookup ACH Accounts

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows the lookup of Payee ACH Account records of certain transaction type(s).

column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Look Up Records' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS')

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'componentName')

column.name: KIM_TYP_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Look Up Records' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS')

column.name: KIM_ATTR_DEFN_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-NS' and nm = 'namespaceCode')

column.name: PERM_TMPL_ID
column.valueNumeric: (select perm_tmpl_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Initiate Document' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-SYS')

column.name: NM
column.value: Initiate ACH Account Document

column.name: DESC_TXT
column.value: Allows initiation the PDP Payee ACH Account maintenance document.

column.valueNumeric: (select kim_typ_id from KRIM_PERM_TMPL_T where nm = 'Initiate Document' and nmspc_cd = 'KR-SYS')

column.valueNumeric: (select kim_attr_defn_id from KRIM_ATTR_DEFN_T where nmspc_cd = 'KR-WKFLW' and nm = 'documentTypeName')
